thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Amazing!
thread.title_full: Amazing! - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Katie R
title: Amazing!
text: I have just got back from the most amazing trip to NYC! We had booked through Virgin Atlantic the flights and hotel. When booking the hotel we researched it a lot and noticed quite a lot of bad reviews, I have no idea why!!! The hotel was brilliant! I had been to NYC before and the previous hotel I had stayed in was more expensive and so small. I was so surprised walking into the room, it was huge even though it was called a 'cozy room'. The hotel was old school NYC and really presented beautifully. The staff were lovely I really could not fault the hotel at all. It was in a brilliant location, only 2 blocks away from Times Square. I would 100% recommend this hotel to anyone, it's amazing!
